mean_cn: vt.宣布；  vi.作播音员，宣布竞选
mean_en: to make (something) known in a public or formal way; to officially tell people about (something); to indicate beforehand; to give information about something in a public place, especially through a loudspeaker
sentence: He announced the birth of his child on his WeChat.
sentence_trans: 他在微信上宣布了孩子出生的消息。
word_etyma: an加强意义 + nounce通知 → announce通告
